string.text: Go to the village inn
You are in the village inn.
Visit the inn
Back to village
Inn Helper
Start a new tournament with denars
Start a new tournament with influence
Are you sure you want to start a tournament using {TOURNAMENT_COST}{GOLD_ICON}?
Are you sure you want to start a tournament using {TOURNAMENT_COST} influence?
Start Tournament Confirmation
It costs {TOURNAMENT_COST} influence to start a tournament.
It costs {TOURNAMENT_COST}{GOLD_ICON} to start a tournament.
It costs {TOURNAMENT_COST} influence to start a tournament. You do not have enough influence!
It costs {TOURNAMENT_COST}{GOLD_ICON} to start a tournament. You do not have enough {GOLD_ICON}!
You are not affiliated with this town.
You have used {INFLUENCE_COST} influence to start a tournament!
Train Clan Members
Castle Training Grounds
The castle is a good area to train up your companions. It will take {NUM_TRAINING_HOURS} hours.
Start Training
You have no companions to train!
Your renown is not high enough! The castle owner does not allow you to train at their castle!
You are training your companion...
Your Companions
Choose a companion to train.
Choose a companion to train.

You put {TRAINEE.NAME} through the basics of soldiering, discipline and obedience. But it's not over yet, {?TRAINEE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} seems enthusiastic to show-off what he learnt from you and is asking for a friendly fully-armed duel. However, having such a duel on castle grounds will cause too much trouble!
Head outside the castle to start the duel.
Reject the idea of the duel.
[Bannerlord Expanded]: {TRAINEE.NAME} has gained {AMOUNT_XP} XP in {SKILL_NAME}.
{TRAINEE.NAME} has lost and accepted his defeat. However you are confident that {?TRAINEE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} has improved tremendously from before.
You have lost and accepted your defeat. It seems that {TRAINEE.NAME} has grown stronger and surpassed you.
Host party for soldiers
Host Party For Your Soldiers
You found a suitable room to host a party for your soldiers. It will take about {NUM_OF_HOURS} hours and {NUM_OF_DENARS} to prepare.
You do not have enough denars.
You are not the owner of this castle!
Start Preparations
You gathered all available people from your castle to help out with the preparations. Preparations are ongoing...
The preparations are finished! Temporary tavern maids are on standby while your men are walking in.
Join the party!
Your party's morale has increased!
Thank you granting us this small period of joy, your highness.
Your highness, after all this fighting, I am grateful for this party that honors us.
Ayeeee, this feast is what we needed!
Party Room
Inn Module
Maximum number of wanderers in village
The maximum number of wanderers that can be in a village at once. Expect lag/temporary freezes if you set a high number. Click on Refresh Wanderers button when changing this setting while in-game!
Auto-refresh Wanderers weekly
Automatically refreshes the wanderers at the start of every week. May cause lag!
Refresh Wanderers
Press to refresh
Removes all current wanderers and spawn new ones. Use when changing max number of companions midgame! MAY CAUSE TEMPORARY FREEZE
Start Your Own Tournaments
Denar Cost to start tournaments
How much denars it costs to start a tournament.
Influence Cost to start tournaments
How much influence it costs to start a tournament.
Companion Training
Hours to train companion
How many hours it takes to train a companion.
Number of random skills for companion to improve
When a companion finishes training, this setting will determine how many random skills the companion will improve on.
XP gain per skill level
How much xp per skill level your companion will gain when finishing training.
Host Party For Soldiers
Party Cost in Denars
How much denars it cost to host a party.
Party Preparation Duration in Hours
How many hours it takes to prepare the party.
Party Morale Gain
How much morale is gained from hosting a party.
